ygData.subject: Re: FACTS ON ARADUNE aka BRAD McQUAID
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to be and do whatever the ... REASON WE HAVE THE GAME.  I ... year before beta even ... before beta and 989 was ... so jesus I hope he has the ... PRODUCER
ygData.messageBody:
---Jason Shy <demur@...> wrote:
>
> From: "Jason Shy" <demur@...>
>
> Jesus! Aradune can be whatever the hell he wants
to be and do whatever the
> hell he wants to do. . .GET IT . . .HE IS THE
REASON WE HAVE THE GAME. I
> followed this game for 2 years before release and a
year before beta even
> came out. . .this game was supposed to flop long
before beta and 989 was
> going to back out altogether. . he made it happen
so jesus I hope he has the
> best items HE can imagine!
>
> As for him being a GM. . Brad McQuaid is the
PRODUCER and LEAD DEVELOPER at
> 989 studios here in San Diego. Aradune is his lv
50 GM ranger! In case you
> havent noticed he is still part of the "Guild
Creator" team and has to log
> on at least for 1 hour once a week to create
guilds. . he uses Aradune for
> this, and of course. . .to slay Lady Vox. LOL
>
> Sorry for the long post, just some FACTUAL info. I
am sorry everyone but I
> will no longer be subscribed to this list. . not
worth the damn 50 e-mails
> to delete every night full of bickering about
nonsense! I have maybe used 2
> pieces of information from this board. Good
travels to you all, and please
> no one take this personally!
>
> Frustrated Demur
>
> ;(
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com' <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 12:11 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] ARDUNE IS NOT A GM
>
>
> >From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> >
> >You are wrong. Aradune Mithara is a GM.
> >
> >Aradune with GM tag on...
>
>http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/adventures/LadyVox04.htm
> >
> >Aradune with GM tag off...
>
>http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/adventures/LadyVox22.htm
> >
> >He also plays a regular character on Veeshan that
is not Aradune. He
> >has not released the name of that character. Here
is what he said about
> >his group though...
> >
> >"I live in the San Diego area and have a Cox @home
cable modem and it
> >rocks -- very rarely do I have any connectivity
problems and/or packet
> >loss.
> >
> >My group, which ranges from 15-22, can virtually
live in [Permafrost]
> >with rarely a death. You probably want to bring
some friends with ya :)
> >"
> >
> >> -----Original Message-----
> >> From: Simon [SMTP:simon21@...]
> >> Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 1:56 PM
> >> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] ARDUNE IS NOT A GM
> >>
> >> From: Simon <simon21@...>
> >>
> >> actually Ardune (spelling?) is not a GM. why
everyone thinks he is i
> >> don't know. is his name
> >> green? NO. does he have GM only items? NO! he
is played by the lead
> >> programer Brad McQuade or
> >> however u spell his last name, hehe. but Ardune
is not a GM. he is
> >> just Brad's character in game.
> >>
> >> Tim West wrote:
> >>
> >> > From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
> >> >
> >> > Yes, he is a GM. In fact this character is
used by Brad McQuaid

is why his ranger can
> >> use
> >> > the sword. Check out the picture of him at
the Fires Of Heaven
> >> website
> >> > under "The Killing Of Lady Vox".
> >> >
> >> > Tanaman

THANK GOD! PLEASE SHUT THE HELL UP WITH THIS! AND HOW
THE HELL DO YOU UNSUBSCRIBE? please mark heading for
subject as UNSUBSCRIBE as i have to wade thru a
meaningless bunch of CRAP to get to it!!!!
